titles.title: Volunteer Driver Tax Appreciation Act of 2019
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to equalize the charitable mileage rate with the business travel rate.
Volunteer Driver Tax Appreciation Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Volunteer Driver Tax Appreciation Act of 2019
This bill increases the standard mileage rate for the tax deduction for the charitable use of a passenger automobile. The bill increases the rate from the standard charitable rate of 14 cents per mile to the standard business mileage rate (58 cents per mile for 2019).
